properties.name: vertx.mqtt.client-id
properties.description: The client id to use when connecting to the MQTT broker.

properties.name: vertx.mqtt.host
properties.description: The hostname of the MQTT server.

properties.name: vertx.mqtt.port
properties.description: The port of the MQTT server.

properties.name: vertx.mqtt.username
properties.description: The username to use when connecting to the MQTT server.

properties.name: vertx.mqtt.password
properties.description: The password to use when connecting to the MQTT server.

properties.name: vertx.mqtt.cleanSession
properties.description: Whether to use a clean session or not.
